entry.title: Anywhere and Everywhere
entry.summary:
Author: Thewriting_hub

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 49,901Chapters: 13/40Kudos: 277

Summary: Jason was your everything. No matter how many years pass, you'll never recover from how he was taken from you. You still saw him, anywhere and everywhere. Sometimes it comforted you knowing you would never truly be without him but sometimes it was very inconvenient. Like tonight, Scarecrow was planning on a mass release of his newest fear toxin, not to mention he was working with someone new on the Gotham crime scene but they seemed so very familiar.

entry.title: Red Hood, Green Heart
entry.summary:
Author: Persadol

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 50,984Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 45

Summary: Jason Todd has died before-and he hasn't quite come back whole. Haunted by shadows of his past and the weight of justice in Gotham, he finds comfort only in silence and the static crackle of Alfred's voice in his comms.That is, until the night a portal rips open above him and a very unexpected visitor-blue-skinned, horned, and definitely not from this world-crashes straight into his life. Literally.You're a druid from the forests of the Forgotten Realms, on a peaceful path of healing and harmony‚Ä¶ until a bandit ambush and a wild spell gone wrong land you flat on top of a masked stranger in a dark, alien city.Jason doesn't do magic. You don't do guns. But somehow, between Gotham rooftops and druidic spells, trauma and trust, gunfire and green growth-you might just change each other's worlds.

entry.title: His Dancer
entry.summary:
Author: potato_saladisass

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,890Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 22

Summary: Everyone's heard of him by now. How could they not? The Iceberg Lounge getting a new owner was news in of itself. That new owner being Jason Todd... as in Bruce Wayne's second ward who mysteriously disappeared, *that* Jason Todd? The one and only. And he's only inherited Brucie Wayne's flair for the public, all while dominating his business.He's sloppy, but charming. Always has an answer for everything. especially whatever hardball question thrown at him by the press. But no one truly knows what happens behind his office doors.Not even you. You're just some paid escort for the night. To sit by his side and hang off his arm... and to be quiet. You're a usual dancer at the Lounge, but this hardly seems like a promotion despite what the money may tell you. You've been sitting with him for an hour now, being gawked at by his associated like some prize to be won.

entry.title: Loathing. (A Dick Grayson/Reader/Jason Todd Story)
entry.summary:
Author: men_written_by_women_enthusiast

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,625Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 46

Summary: You had a good life. You got an acceptance letter to Gotham University. You had a second family you could visit whenever that also consisted of undercover vigilantes. You had a best friend.Jason Todd.But he died.No, he didn't die, he was murdered.You also had a very close friend that you bonded with over the event, Dick Grayson.Now that you're a vigilante yourself years later, what are you going to do when the once murdered Jason enters your life again?‚Äî¬∞.‚ãÜ ìÜ∞ìÜ™ ‚ãÜ.¬∞‚ÄîHey there! Few warnings. ONE, this is not a poly fic. This is what I would call a love V, not a complete triangle. Two fighting for the one (yourself). There will be canon-adjacent action and gore. There will be slight angst (duh), and eventual smut if my reader base would like it. Once I am done with writing, there will be two separate chapter endings for which of the brothers you would wish to choose. I'm on a DC kick! I can't wait to delve into more Batfamily content <3Spotify playlist, loves, as per usual <3https://open.spotify.com/playlist/6wTG76ZwrNE5yqYHLpPf0W?si=SxTk-fMPTNSavQQ0T3Tz1wPinterest inspo boardhttps://pin.it/4RqYCtntO
